[### A PERMIT IS REQUIRED BEFORE ANY CONSTRUCTION MAY BEGIN, PER CITY ORDINANCE](https://www.beachcitytx.us/#)

**The City of Beach City requires that all Improvements/Construction must have an approved permit
to beginning construction.**

**Please call the City office if you have**
